Title: Department Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
Writer: Jussi Adler-Olsen (novel), Nikolaj Arcel, Nikolaj Arcel
Actors: Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Per Scheel Krüger, Troels Lyby, Øyvind B. Fabricius Holm
Plot: Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman.
